Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_na3gpo20&referenceId=1_na3gpo20&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: It's been a week of wild swings on Wall Street - with Amazon heading for the biggest one-day gain ever, just a day after Meta Platforms chalked up the biggest loss. Next week is a busy one for earnings - with Pepsi, Coca-Cola and Disney all on deck.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/34dkGzU
